Text: is it the pilot for the 2009verison ?

No description makes me not want to download this at all!  Knight Rider movie?  Is this where Kitt was put into an older model car in the future?  Parts of his "e-Brain" were placed in a woman's head?  Or is this the Pilot to the new KR where Kitt was rebuilt in present day into a 'Stang?  

A little information would have been nice!  :)
